title: Patch 6.10 Broken
body:
Basically, ever since 6.10, every time I go to start a match the following happens:
-Start up queue
-Go into champ select
-As soon as champ select ends, we go into the match, then I just get a black screen saying either the game crashed or it says the client stopped working and I need to either debug or close the program. If I go to debug, it just crashes anyways. 

I even uninstalled and reinstalled hoping that'd fix it but it didn't. It can't be any of my hardware, because I was just playing plenty last night.

Rito plz, or anyone, help


EDIT - 
IF YOU'RE READING THIS, TO FIX IT UNINSTALL OR STOP **_ LOLREPLAY_**!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: I have the same problem. I don't know if it is because I play on a Macbook Pro or what's going on... But basically every time I get to the loading screen my screen turns black and it doesn't log into the game.
This is good information to give out.  If LoLReplay is causing the client to crash repeatedly, make sure to uninstall it for this patch!
Is this some sneaky hidden thing you put in this patch? :P because we all know Riot's loathing for third party applications.
same shit man, better not get a dodge for this.

I heard that if you have LOLreplay, uninstall or close it. I uninstalled it but it left behind a LOLreplay folder that despite how many times I delete it permanently, it keeps coming back. So my client still won't work.
I got a dodge for it btw.
